summary: Defines a set of reusable security utilities for FastAPI that implement common HTTP authentication schemes. It provides a foundational HTTP security base class and concrete implementations for Basic, Bearer, and Digest authentication, handling extraction and validation of credentials from incoming requests and generation of appropriate Authorization headers for outgoing calls.
business_intent: Allow developers to protect FastAPI endpoints using standard HTTP authentication mechanisms (Basic, Bearer token, Digest) by supplying readyâ€‘made, callable security dependencies that automatically parse, verify, and enforce credentials.
